content:
本件保存七年
02-62- 143 1 1
MEMORANDUM
To : Fr. R. L. Hirshbarg Program Officer, US AID/G
From : C. G. Chang Chief, Second Division C. C. Chang
Original signed by
Subject: Excess Equipment
Haference is made by the attached copy of AsHB letter dated May 3, 1962.
In the above letter, it is requested that trailers and other szuass supplies now located at the Tainan Air Base be acquired for the use of Kalla, Pas, THB and KJHB. If you concur and they are available, please initiate necessary action for acquisition.
Encl. Copy of KaHB letter ce: Jüwhite (with copy of Kall letter) PUB, THE, KLHB, Kale (with copy of Kalle Jetter) 20, 30, 40
GsN/se
E-16,13,2
51.3. 100×200
457
國史馆 Academia Historica
D

From : C. G. Chang Chief, Second Division C. C. Chang
Haference is made by the attached copy of AsHB letter dated May 3, 1962.

In the above letter, it is requested that trailers and other szuass supplies now located at the Tainan Air Base be acquired for the use of Kalla, Pas, THB and KJHB. If you concur and they are available, please initiate necessary action for acquisition.
Encl. Copy of KaHB letter ce: Jüwhite (with copy of Kall letter) PUB, THE, KLHB, Kale (with copy of Kalle Jetter) 20, 30, 40
